alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:09AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Near Bankfull Water Levels On The Yukon River From Eagle To Circle This Weekend And Early Next Week... The Yukon River at Dawson, YT is very high and expected to rise through early next week. Downstream at Eagle, near bankfull conditions are expected by Sunday night. This water will continue downstream early next week. Normally exposed gravel bars between Eagle and Circle will be submerged due to the high water, and people traveling on the river should be prepared for an increased amount of debris flowing downstream, in addition to the high water and faster current. For more information, detailed river forecasts can be found at www.weather.gov/aprfc. JC

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
